channel.title: Client Question [PI]
channel.description: Alright ive had my server out for quiet some time now and i decided to just turn it off and add lots of major updates but people have my old client that was used for people to play but now. Is there anyway like i can add somthing to my client so you can only use THAT SPECIFIC CLIENT to connect to my server.

item.title: Client Question [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Mariokillu Mariokillu
item.description:
@Mariokillu wrote:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,444519.msg3263691.html#post_pi

This tutorial is to fix cheat clients but it pretty much makes a certain client useable.

Read full topic
